mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (id, Cart_Id, Pid, quantity) VALUES (null, #{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.quantity, ci.Cart_Id, p.name, p.price, p.discountedPrice, p.discount, (ci.quantity * IFNULL(p.discountedPrice, p.price)) AS total_price_per_item, p.id, p.majorCategory, p.middleCategory, p.content, p.regDate, p.amount, p.updateDate, p.mainImgPath, p.mainImgName, p.subImgPath, p.subImgName, ( SELECT SUM(ci.quantity * IFNULL(p.discountedPrice, p.price)) FROM cart_items ci JOIN cart c ON ci.Cart_Id = c.id JOIN product p ON ci.Pid = p.id WHERE c.Uid = #{userId} ) AS total_amount FROM cart_items ci JOIN cart c ON ci.Cart_Id = c.id JOIN product p ON ci.Pid = p.id WHERE c.Uid = #{userId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE Cart_id = #{cartId} AND Pid = #{productId}
